title: Ep. 15 | 2 Bears 1 Cave w/ Tom Segura & Bert Kreischer
description: Bert Kreischer is burning his mouth on an Uncrustable while Tom Segura laughs. That’s how this episode of 2 Bears 1 Cave begins. The only way to follow that is with a history lesson. Plus, we find out about Tom’s parenting misstep and about what a miracle Bert’s kids are alive and haven’t been taken away. There’s a quick call from Joey Diaz and the Bears reminisce about Bert’s old sex show.
author: 2bears1cave@gmail.com (2 Bears 1 Cave)
